Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.Factory
  • public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton - Class that parses the json files and creates arrays containing all the DevelopmentCards, LeaderCards, Cells and Tiles

      • createLeaderCard

        private LeaderCard createLeaderCard​(int id,
                                    java.lang.String front_path,
                                    LeaderAbility ability,
                                    int victory_points,
                                    org.json.simple.JSONObject requirements_obj)
                             throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Parameters:
        id - the incremental id of the LeaderCard
        ability - the ability of the LeaderCard
        victory_points - the victory points of the LeaderCard
        requirements_obj - the JSONObject containing all the requirements parameters
        Returns:
        the correct LeaderCard based on the requirements
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

      • createSoloActionToken

        private SoloActionToken createSoloActionToken​(org.json.simple.JSONObject solo_action_token)
                                       throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Create a SoloActionToken
        Parameters:
        solo_action_token - the JSONObject containing all the information about the SoloActionToken
        Returns:
        the correct SoloActionToken based on the type
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if it cannot parse the token or if a DiscardDevelopmentCards token has a wrong color
